coding_practices: Follow existing Laravel conventions and PSR-12 formatting.
Use composer scripts where available (e.g., "composer test", "composer pint").
Prefer explicit exception expectations that mirror real messages.

testing.notes: Add or update unit tests for any new feature or bug fix before merging.

ci_considerations: Ensure composer.lock matches the target PHP version used in CI.
Prefer running Pint and the test suite locally before push.

documentation.pull_request_summary: Summarize code changes and cite affected areas; include testing performed.
